Description: On I-495 at mile marker 55.1 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 213 in the County of New Kent, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The west right shoulder is closed. The west exit ramp narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 122 in the County of Albemarle, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east right lane and right shoulder are closed.

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 250.3 in the City of Newport News, near Fort Eustis Boulevard, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east center lane, right lane, right shoulder, and exit 250B are closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 123.8 in the County of Spotsylvania, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage
